easyStandard.skull: -X. X is half of the doom on Azathoth (rounded up), to a minimum of 2.
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a _Cultist_ enemy and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
easyStandard.tablet: -2. If you fail, Azathoth attacks you.
easyStandard.elderThing: -4. If your modified skill value for this test is 0, place 1 doom on Azathoth.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is the amount of doom on Azathoth, to a minimum of 2.
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a _Cultist_ enemy and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.
hardExpert.tablet: -3. If you fail, Azathoth attacks you.
hardExpert.elderThing: -6. If your modified skill value for this test is 0, place 1 doom on Azathoth.

xp.resolution2: Saved the universe from being devoured.
xp.resolution3: Saved the universe from being devoured.
xp.resolution5: Learned the innermost secrets of the Black Book.
